snippet: The Round Robin Teams top bracket played on Dec. 30, the last day of the Edgar Kaplan Winter Regional in Manhattan, was won by two married couples.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deals played during the Round Robin Teams tournament at the Edgar Kaplan Winter Regional in New York City.
lead_paragraph: The Round Robin Teams top bracket played on Dec. 30, the last day of the Edgar Kaplan Winter Regional in Manhattan, was won by two married couples.
